analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BuyBack.setActive (/unique_chucks/6/0x024cb480c6bf81eea0067c2682a706e5da5c6024.sol#553-559):
	External calls:
	- _emitActiveChanged(_active) (/unique_chucks/6/0x024cb480c6bf81eea0067c2682a706e5da5c6024.sol#555-556)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isActive (/unique_chucks/6/0x024cb480c6bf81eea0067c2682a706e5da5c6024.sol#556)

Object.withdrawnTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x024cb480c6bf81eea0067c2682a706e5da5c6024.sol#103-113) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(token).transfer(_to,balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0x024cb480c6bf81eea0067c2682a706e5da5c6024.sol#112)

BuyBack.sell (/unique_chucks/6/0x024cb480c6bf81eea0067c2682a706e5da5c6024.sol#606-638) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-delayedPayments.authorizePayment(msg.sender,total,3600) (/unique_chucks/6/0x024cb480c6bf81eea0067c2682a706e5da5c6024.sol#634-637)
